name: UIDocumentInteractionController
desc: A view controller that previews, opens, or prints files with a file format that your app canâ€™t handle directly.

items.name: init(url: URL)
items.desc: Creates and returns a new UIDocumentInteractionController object initialized with the specified URL.

items.name: var delegate: UIDocumentInteractionControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate you want to receive document interaction notifications.

items.name: protocol UIDocumentInteractionControllerDelegate
items.desc: A set of methods you can implement to respond to messages from a document interaction controller.

items.name: func presentPreview(animated: Bool) -> Bool
items.desc: Displays a full-screen preview of the target document.

items.name: func dismissPreview(animated: Bool)
items.desc: Dismisses the currently active document preview.

items.name: func presentOptionsMenu(from: CGRect, in: UIView, animated: Bool) -> Bool
items.desc: Displays an options menu and anchors it to the specified location in the view.

items.name: func presentOptionsMenu(from: UIBarButtonItem, animated: Bool) -> Bool
items.desc: Displays an options menu and anchors it to the specified bar button item.

items.name: func presentOpenInMenu(from: CGRect, in: UIView, animated: Bool) -> Bool
items.desc: Displays a menu for opening the document and anchors that menu to the specified view.

items.name: func presentOpenInMenu(from: UIBarButtonItem, animated: Bool) -> Bool
items.desc: Displays a menu for opening the document and anchors that menu to the specified bar button item.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The URL identifying the target file on the local filesystem.

items.name: var uti: String?
items.desc: The type of the target file.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The name of the target file.

items.name: var icons: [UIImage]
items.desc: The images associated with the target file.

items.name: var annotation: Any?
items.desc: Custom property list information for the target file.

items.name: var gestureRecognizers: [UIGestureRecognizer]
items.desc: The system-supplied gesture recognizers for presenting a document interaction controller.
